channel.title: [help] Adding Dragon Claws Server Sided [Pi]
channel.description: my base is PI and i have the models. i tryed to follow this guide [url=http://www.google.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/235346-pi-adding-dragon-claws-client-sided-pi.html]http://www.google.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/235346-pi-adding-dragon-claws-client-sided-pi.html[/url] but all i got was invisible claws (everything worked and i got no errors) but anyways i deleted everything from the making of that guide thanks for helping. Any ways i put in a folder called Raw.

item.title: [help] Adding Dragon Claws Server Sided [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Normally you get a model as a .dat file and you add it into the MODELS folder in your client. Then you would add the ints to class8.java and compile. Then the claws are added server sided.

Read full topic

item.title: [help] Adding Dragon Claws Server Sided [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @weed4u weed4u
item.description:
@weed4u wrote:

yeah on the tutorial it says to make a new folder called “Raw” and put them in there… and then once i added some codes they said to type “add model” IN-GAME and it worked and i typed the codes but nothing… but what they didnt explain was where do i put the “Raw” folder so i just put at the main menu of the client.

Read full topic
